attributes.action: Ensure the secure future of the William Morris Gallery and its unique archive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Facing partial closure now - and no guarantee of it's future at all in coming years, the only Museum in the World dedicated to the great artisan, designer and writer William Morris is under threat. The London Borough of Waltham Forest appears to be showing no appreciation of this jewel in it's cultural crown and is endangering the learning experiences of its community for generations to come.
